CustomField.description: A check box indicating that the client's logo is approved for use in RT's marketing materials. The box is checked by default whenever a new account is created after 23 May 2014 when RT's Terms & Conditions were updated to reflect that RT can use client's logo for use in RT's marketing materials upon agreeing to use RT's services
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A check box indicating that the client's logo is approved for use in RT's marketing materials. Uncheck is client wants to Opt Out
CustomField.label: Logo Approved for Use
